text: if you have never used cloud before if
you've never done any pilots with AWS
technologies where should one start
I recommend strongly setting up sandbox
accounts for your employees to play with
they go take their basic training in AWS
technologies and then they have an
environment where they can experiment
these sandbox accounts can be shut down
at the end of the day you can set limits
you can very much control the costs
associated with it but since there is no
compression algorithm for experience
this sandbox account allows your
employees to to play like they were
children but to play with new
technologies and see how it would apply
to their business a second approach
perhaps in inclusive of setting up
sandbox accounts is to do pair
programming is to pair your developers
with the Nick with an experienced AWS
experienced individual either from AWS
or from a partner so that your
developers can learn how to fish and
learn how to use the technologies before
they actually go and work on a
production solution a production
workload to ship to market
you
